content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, and I'm here to help set up your appointment. May I have your name, please?
Hi Ava! This is Harold Johnson.
Thank you, Harold! Can you please provide the address where you need our plumbing services?
Thank you, Harold! Let me check if your address is within our service area.

I'm sorry, Harold, but it looks like your address at 981 Old Sycamore Lane, Rivertown is currently outside our service area. We won’t be able to send a technician to your location. If you have any other requests or questions, let me know—otherwise, thank you for considering XYZ Home Services!
